with Pyth Network oracle on Mantle for real-time price data  Pyth Integration Pattern: 1. params._pythContract: Address of Pyth oracle contract on Mantle

getCachedPriceUnsafe(bytes32).details: Use with caution - does not check if price is stale

returns.timestamp: The timestamp of the cached price

getLatestPrice(bytes32).details: Reverts if price is stale or unavailable

returns.price: The latest price (with expo scaling, e.g., price * 10^expo)
returns.timestamp: The timestamp of the price update

returns._0: age Age in seconds (0 if invalid)
price The price at mint time
PriceData struct with all price information
fee The required fee in wei
bool True if price is stale or invalid

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

recordMintPrice(uint256,bytes32).details: Should be called during token minting to snapshot the price

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updatePrice(bytes32,bytes[]).details: Requires payment for Pyth update fee (sent as msg.value)      Backend should fetch priceUpdate from: https://hermes.pyth.network/api/latest_vaas?ids[]={priceId}

params.priceUpdate: Price update data from Pyth Price Service API

withdrawETH().details: Should not be needed in normal operation

addPriceFeed(bytes32).notice: Add a new supported price feed

getCachedPriceUnsafe(bytes32).notice: Get cached price without staleness check (unsafe)

getLatestPrice(bytes32).notice: Get latest cached price for a feed

getPriceAge(bytes32).notice: Get the age of cached price data in seconds

getPriceAtMint(uint256).notice: Get the price recorded at token mint time

getPriceData(bytes32).notice: Get full price data including confidence and expo

getUpdateFee(bytes[]).notice: Get the update fee required for a price update

isPriceStale(bytes32).notice: Check if price data is stale

isSupportedFeed(bytes32).notice: Check if a price feed is supported

recordMintPrice(uint256,bytes32).notice: Record price at mint time for a token

updatePrice(bytes32,bytes[]).notice: Update cached price from Pyth contract
